text: ni enakkuk kattalaiyittapati (manitarkalai nokki), "ennutaiya iraivanum, unkalutaiya iraivanumakiya allahvaiye vanankunkal" enpatait tavira veru etaiyum avarkalukku nan kuravillai. Melum, nan avarkalutan (ulakil) irunta kalamellam avarkalaik kankanippavanaka irunten;. Appal ni ennaik kaipparriya pinnar niye avarkal mitu kankanippavanaka iruntay. Niye ellap porutkal mitum catciyaka irukkiray" (enrum)
